text: @realDonaldTrump You fat fuck, the cost to American tax payers for your "very fast" golf round is estimated at $600,000 to $1,000,000 dollars to start with. Add that 10s of thousands are lying in hospital beds dying of covid19 while you deflect from the pandemic with this crap!!
